short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Queries newsrdr.us and displays the number of unread posts in the toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a view of the number of unread articles on newsrdr.us and allows you to directly access your unread articles on the service.
